EmailTemplate.name: 03 – Research summary
EmailTemplate.subject: About our research process
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Nice talking to you again. If you haven’t already visited our web site, it’s a great resource for all things Five Star Professional, including detailed information about our research process.
Award candidates must be nominated by their firm or peers to be considered for the Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award. Nominees are evaluated against 10 objective criteria including education and professional designations and a favorable regulatory and complaint history. The resulting list of Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s represents an exclusive group of area {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}s who provide quality services to their clients.
You can go to the Research section of our web site to learn more. Let me know if I can provide any more information.
www.fivestarprofessional.com/awards/research.php
{!User.Name} Account Manager
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway, Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
